abstract: If you like the trackpad shortcuts on Apple’s laptops, you can use many of the same moves on an external trackpad for your desktop computer.
snippet: If you like the trackpad shortcuts on Apple’s laptops, you can use many of the same moves on an external trackpad for your desktop computer.
lead_paragraph: Q. Do the trackpad shortcuts on a MacBook work the same way on an iMac if you buy an external trackpad to use instead of the included mouse?

headline.main: Move Around an iMac by Touch

abstract: They also don’t want anyone to talk about it, a fact that has riled a number of tech companies that are chafing under gag orders.
snippet: They also don’t want anyone to talk about it, a fact that has riled a number of tech companies that are chafing under gag orders.
lead_paragraph: A gentle reminder: The Justice Department backing off demands that Apple help it break the security of an iPhone six months ago does not mean law enforcement isn’t still very interested in the information gathered and protected by tech companies.

headline.main: Daily Report: The Feds Can’t Resist Silicon Valley’s Data
